Content:
Likely my final tweet regarding crypto

As I always say, if you have long term conviction in BTC and ETH, you will outperform just holding and not trading

They're only going to keep printing more money; you're unlikely to time every local move

ETH at 10k is one day programmed

@YaBoiBru Likely my final tweet regarding crypto

As I always say, if you have long term conviction in BTC and ETH, you will outperform just holding and not trading

They're only going to keep printing more money; you're unlikely to time every local move

ETH at 10k is one day programmed

Eid-ul-Fitr Mubarak

Wishing you all peace, happiness, harmony, good health and prosperity on the occasion of Eid https://t.co/Nl0utAEUdk

AI startup idea for someone 

Create something that identifies probabilistic model for which new uniswap meme coins will be rugs

With a large enough data set of prior rugs, likely to be some identifying variables

A16z writes you large check in 2025 for https://t.co/nhGd8s0mwv

拿

利润

ancient chinese proverb

Poll to gauge sentiment 

Will Ethereum's latest upgrade, dubbed Shanghai, result in

RIP @BittrexGlobal
First exchange I traded heavily on

Fond memories of losing money on DragonChain
Never got hacked or misappropriated user funds, but was in the wrong jurisdiction
Ramadan Mubarak to all the Muslim brothers and sisters in the world https://t.co/dZmuhffpnV

Trump's arrest and martyrdom makes it more, not less, likely he is the victor

Maintain > 90% odds he is the Republican nominee

Don't get too high;  the entire banking system is not going to collapse overnight, leading to hyperbitcoinization + 1 million $ BTC

Don't get too low; when we get a correction, this wasn't a scam pump engineered by CZ for exit liq, going back to 0

Stay even

Study 2019 and 2020

As the bottom of the last cycle was marked by forced selling from hedge funds

Bottom of next cycle could be marked by capitulation from developing nations

Nayib Bukele + El Salvador as a test run; next cycle, we see small countries overleveraging on BTC near the top

Years away

US Hyperinflation Before 2050?

Forecasters on metaculus are assigning it 5%

And this gives a 27 year time interval, much longer than a few months

I went much higher than 5%, but still very unlikely [(CPI U) has an annual growth rate of at least 100%]

https://t.co/PO329i5LZ3
He who chases two rabbits catches neither

It's been repeated on CT for years, and is some of the most obvious advice

But for those of you who haven't digested it;  if you don't have much cash and looking to get capitalized

There's no greater opportunity in this world than farming airdrops;  can really change your life

The old paradigm of fractional reserve banking will increasingly lose sustainability in the social media era

Information flows quicker, causing a reflexive spiral of quicker bank runs that can easily be triggered

Slowly, but surely, people will demand an alternative; a new path

sentiment poll

what % of your net worth is allocated to crypto, not including stables

and in replies, which tokens are you in at what exposure level?
History is on our side;  we trust code over governments

Natural question;  if not USDC, then what?
I've long warned to not trust any stablecoins [including USDT]

If you're in stables, sell it for fiat and send it to a bank that is too big to fail [JP Morgan, BoA, Wells Fargo tier] and backed by armies

If you're in BTC, cold storage

If you bought the crash on USDC, take profit here at 97c;  no point being greedy for another 3%

The past few years should have taught a lesson to not trust official statements or promises

Not trying to cause panic or alarm, but you're better safe than sorry

Some more context 

Although GOP wouldn't advocate for crypto as part of the campaign, Republican control would be indirectly bullish 

1-More libertarian leaning/free market absolutists appointed to regulatory bodies such as SEC [compare Jay Clayton to Gensler

2-More dovish Fed
My inverse investments are with great companies https://t.co/AxPTNoK4JL

@blockchaingod69 Buying quality coins for long term and shorting garbage was/is the play. 

GCR told everyone what he was doing but most people still manage to fuck it up.

Most laws and regulations that are initially written under the pretense of 'protecting retail', are in time, coopted by powerful interests to entrench their financial hegemony

Mostly psyops;  rarely accomplishes initial objectives

What should you expect for the 2024 election cycle;  for both parties to continue to be unified in calling crypto a scam [including Trump himself]

Although a good % of Americans own 'crypto', this is typically Bob Johnson down 90% on the $100 of dog stock he bought at the top

@lickitysplit_7 @CL207 AGI123 one of the all time great prediction market traders [maybe top 5], not well enough known outside of PI circles

https://t.co/J5pwBE9bk7

Believe it to be extraordinarily unlikely Coinbase would launch their own token/security

Being regulatory compliant is the biggest edge they have on other exchanges;  wouldn't make sense to endanger this

Coinbase already has their own altcoin, it just happens to be a stock

My tweet re: Greater China's contributions was somehow controversial

West has been conditioned into certain level of sinophobia for past century, with all sorts of implicit biases 

We often see this framing 

Asian projects = ponzis
Western projects = glorification of 'builders

Regardless of how you feel about altcoin rotations

We are witnessing a very wholesome moment in crypto right now, with Western and Chinese traders connecting for the first time both on twitter+ in other chats

Driven by the pump inside of us, but friendships being formed

早上好

While I stand by this thesis
Rotation into shitcoins with flimsiest ties to China is as forced as last week's ZK meta

As nani said, Chinese buying coins that Americans think Chinese people would buy

Americans buying coins they think Chinese ppl are buying

Just another rotation

If this was still 2022, the headlines from the past week, and 'macro concerns', would have completely nuked us

What year is it though?

People wish to ascribe recent price action to simply 'mean reversion' from the lows 

not quite 

coins moved from weaker to stronger hands
Take note

Reminder that you can be in synthetic fiat without holding stablecoins

Don't believe any risk is imminent, but have gotten a lot of questions on this issue
Chat GPT on set point theory https://t.co/yPo4Skyu8v

@thiccythot_ @GCRClassic Yeah, but realistically if you put this trade on, even if it's a European-style Option, if we touch or go below 15k before the dec23 exp, you just sell it back on the open mkt or with the OTC desk who will charge a few pts in vol to lock profits. No need to wait for settlement.

interesting dislocation between

-retail traders, who find the idea BTC bottomed in Nov contentious

-options on **, which signal strong confidence we bottomed

delta for 15k BTC going into 2024 [using dec 23 as proxy],priced at 0.14 

if you forecast new lows, great trade awaits https://t.co/6Szq5cQciy

replies to this viral tweet suggesting that if you're obese, you can 

-diet/gym to get lean + be a billionaire

some marginal solutions for long term weight loss [glp-1 agonists, bariatric surgery], but dieting isn't one of them;  your set point is too powerful

health is wealth

Trading alt szns for years, 1 of best indicators for how much juice is left 

How alts react to news, announcements, listings, shills

When a szn is about to rug, traders still long news, but instantly get dumped on

With time left, late longs still get rewarded with continuation

[2]

Although risk assets have rallied for weeks, total marketcap for alts has been flat since Jan 20;  demonstrating a lack of renewed retail bid

Capital is shifting from one narrative to the next, without any underlying belief you would see in a true bull market;  it's an echo

[1] Enjoy these market conditions while they last, and try to make the most of it

The 2019 echo bubble sustained for 48 days from the 6k reclaim to top

Fractals are of limited value, as each cycle is unique, but the altcoin rotations are getting increasingly cynical and greedy

GOP's deus ex machina dream relying on increasingly desperate hopes

What you need to understand about the 2024RNOM

Since Republicans never internalized that DJT lost the 2020 election, for all intents and purposes, he remains the incumbent

Last time an incumbent was denied the party's nomination? Chester Arthur in 1881

80 IQ, but really 145

Trump 2024 thesis most emblematic of midwit meme

Dumbest and smartest people know Trump is going to streamroll RD

Middle grasping at justifications to convince themselves otherwise

2024 BTC memes
Halving
Trump appoints dovish fed;  'we're going to have the biggest stocks ever'
Important update: The Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals has granted an injunction allowing PredictIt to continue operating while the Court considers granting longer term relief.

getting messages from people who made tremendous wealth off this thesis

but wealth isn't wealth until it's realized;   it's not a crime to secure some profit from coins that pumped of this thesis

when volume > marketcap, parabolas are often in final stages (h/t @SplitCapital)

Asians resuscitate crypto from near death experiences at the tail end of bear markets, only to eventually breathe so much life into it, Westerners buy their bags years later

Just how it is, how it's always been;  I didn't make the rules
